el-color.description: The background color of the skeleton block element
el-color.description_zh: 骨架块状元素的背景颜色

bg-color.description: The background color of the skeleton component

animation.description: Whether or not the skeleton block is animated
animation.description_zh: 骨架块是否显示动画效果

border-radius.description: The u-skeleton-fillet class name element, the size of the corresponding skeleton block, in rpx
border-radius.description_zh: u-skeleton-fillet类名元素，对应的骨架块的圆角大小，单位rpx

loading.description: Whether or not to display the skeleton component, set this value to false after the request is complete
loading.description_zh: 是否显示骨架组件，请求完成后，将此值设置为false
